title: Part a. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand in Songland will increase and for explaining that the depreciating Songland dollar increases Songland’s exports to European Union countries because the price of those exports — in terms of euros — decreases.

  • One point is earned for stating that employment in Songland will increase because Songland’s real GDP increases and it takes more labor to produce more goods and services.
descriptions:

  • One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand in Songland will increase and for explaining that the depreciating Songland dollar increases Songland’s exports to European Union countries because the price of those exports — in terms of euros — decreases.

  • One point is earned for stating that employment in Songland will increase because Songland’s real GDP increases and it takes more labor to produce more goods and services.

  • One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand in Songland will increase and for explaining that the depreciating Songland dollar increases Songland’s exports to European Union countries because the price of those exports — in terms of euros — decreases.

  • One point is earned for stating that employment in Songland will increase because Songland’s real GDP increases and it takes more labor to produce more goods and services.

Earns 2 of the following 2 points

  • One point is earned for stating that aggregate demand in Songland will increase and for explaining that the depreciating Songland dollar increases Songland’s exports to European Union countries because the price of those exports — in terms of euros — decreases.

  • One point is earned for stating that employment in Songland will increase because Songland’s real GDP increases and it takes more labor to produce more goods and services.

title: Part b. [0–3]
stimulusHtml:
3 points

  • One point is earned for stating that Songland’s central bank should sell euros.

  • One point is earned for stating that Songland’s central bank should sell government bonds.

  • One point is earned for explaining that the sale of government bonds raises the interest rate in Songland and increases the demand for Songland dollars for financial investment purposes.
descriptions:
